response.original_title: Chaos Kid: Random Acts of Awesome (and Oops!)
response.overview: Milo, a bright and imaginative kid, unintentionally turns everyday situations into hilarious chaos, from swapping salt and sugar at a bake sale to bubbling up the town fountain. But when his spontaneous release of rubber ducks threatens the annual Giant Vegetable Fair and Super Sparkle Fireworks Show, his chaos goes too far.  His sister, Lily, usually just annoyed, now sees his antics as a direct threat to her prize-winning zucchini. She decides to take matters into her own hands, hatching surprisingly "evil" (but kid-friendly) schemes to keep him out of trouble.  With the help of his quirky best friend and a surprisingly understanding adult, Milo must untangle the mess he's created and outsmart Lily's attempts to "help." In doing so, he discovers that even the most chaotic moments can lead to extraordinary solutions and ultimately bring siblings closer.
response.title: Chaos Kid: Random Acts of Awesome (and Oops!)
